title: Supply to service pillars
fullText:
For the purpose of this Standard, the wiring systems supplying service pillars are deemed to be submains.
The supply to service pillars shall be installed as â€”
(a) individual submains supplying a single service pillar; or
(b) common submains supplying multiple service pillars; or
(c) common submains supplying multiple service pillars as a ring circuit.
Typical arrangements for these supply connections are shown in Figures 2.3 to 2.5 for Australia. Item (a) is shown in Figure 2.7 for New Zealand.
